history.proof: assert (H : find_pow2 x = S(loop (Nat.pred x) x)). reflexivity. rewrite H. unfold loop. destruct (div2 x) as [p b]. sfirstorder depth: 3use: pow2_fix1.

original: assert (H : find_pow2 x = S(loop (Nat.pred x) x)). { reflexivity. } rewrite H. unfold find_pow2. unfold loop. destruct (div2 x) as [p b]. simpl. apply pow2_fix1.
